alice@company.org.subject: Question about enterprise pricing
alice@company.org.body: Hello, I'm interested in your enterprise plan. Could you please send me information about pricing and features? Also, do you offer any discounts for non-profits?

mike@user.com.subject: Loving the new update!
mike@user.com.body: Just wanted to say the latest app update is fantastic! The new dashboard is much more intuitive and the performance improvements are noticeable. Great work team!
